radiographic_examinations.findings: A complex 81 x 76-mm retroperitoneal mass (with T2 enhancement and central necrosis) near the right kidney.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat MRI imaging postpartum demonstrated a second mass in the right presacral region.

radiographic_examinations.findings: A 13-mm lesion with high signal on T2-weighted imaging in the paraaortic region near the left renal hilum.
A large retroperitoneal mass surrounding the mesenteric vessels and encasing the superior mesenteric artery.
A 3.5 x 2.2-cm lesion behind the uncinate process of the pancreas, compressing the inferior vena cava.
Two lesions: one adjacent to the right carotid body and a second adjacent to the inferior vena cava posterior to the caudate lobe of the liver.
